entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
